video:video.video:description: During the filming of various episodes of &quot;Countdown to Microsoft Ignite&quot;, your hosts (Rick and Joey) never knew when the cameras were rolling. Now that the event is over, we thought you'd&#8230;

video:video.video:description: With just two weeks until Microsoft Ignite, you're probably finessing your session schedule and starting to think about packing. In this week's Countdown Show, Joey and Rick talk about what's new on&#8230;

video:video.video:description: It's the Countdown Show you've been waiting for... Schedule Builder is live on MyIgnite! In Episode 9, Rick and Joey demo Schedule Builder and great new filtering capabilities that will help you&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Countdown To Microsoft Ignite: The One That Kicks It Off
